titleStmt.title: Marcus Ausonius his foure bookes of morall precepts, intituled Cato concerning the precepts of common life / translated out of Latin hexamiters into English meter by Walter Gosnold gentleman ...
Catonis disticha.
titleStmt.author: Gosnold, Walter.

notesStmt.note: Imprint date (cropped) suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: cropped and tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
